## Description {#details}

This file provides utility VPlan to VPlan transformations.

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Try to have all users of fixed-order recurrences appear after the recipe</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// defining their previous value, by either sinking users or hoisting recipes</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// recurrence phis and previous values.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns true if all users of fixed-order recurrences could be re-arranged</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// as needed or false if it is not possible. In the latter case, \\p Plan is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// not valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Drop poison flags from recipes that may generate a poison value that is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// used after vectorization, even when their operands are not poison. Those</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    memory load/store (VPWidenMemoryInstructionRecipe or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    VPInterleaveRecipe).</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Update \\p Plan to account for the uncountable early exit block in \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// UncountableExitingBlock by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  &#42; updating the condition exiting the vector loop to include the early</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    exit conditions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  &#42; splitting the original middle block to branch to the early exit block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    if taken.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebuilder">VPRecipeBuilder</a> &amp;RecipeBuilder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
